wikipedia_page.main: Professor Dame Joan Kathleen Stringer, DBE, FRSE, FRSA (born 12 May 1948) is a British political scientist and former Principal and Vice-Chancellor of Edinburgh Napier University.

response: | style="height:30px;" data-sort-value="Stringer, Joan" | Professor Joan Stringer CBE

link_mentions.page: List of Dames Commander of the Order of the British Empire
response: *2009: Jenny Abramsky, Sally Davies, Elizabeth Fradd, The Baroness Gould of Brookwood, Barbara Hakin, Wendy Hall, Anne Owers, Linda Partridge, Philippa Russell, Rosalind Savill, Victoria Sharp, Joan Stringer, Mitsuko Uchida
Nolan was appointed Principal & Vice Chancellor of Edinburgh Napier University in 2013, succeeding Dame Joan Stringer to the post, and announced plans for a new University strategy for 2014–2019.
*Dame Joan Stringer DBE, FRSE, FRSA (born 1948), political scientist.
